I know you may not be able to post for a while but I was wondering 
If we c=
ould use the battle between Rodimus and Tucson as the match 
where Tucson's=
 suspicion of a clone proves correct.  The only way he would know for sure =
is if Dark Rodimus's spark chamber gets knocked open during the fight.  In =
order to do that I was wondering if you would allow Tucson to get in a few =
good hits as he too can take a few of his own.  I fully allow for Tucson to=
 take a beating and I was wondering if you would allow the same for Dark Ro=
dimus.  And you get to chose which mode they fight in.   

Also , whoever e=
lse he's put up against, which could very well be a fellow comrade, he will=
 explain his strategy via silent com and inform them that he's playing the =
part to be strategic.   He has to make it look real if he is going to attem=
pt to fool Magmatron, which is going to be an ulitimate challenge of wisdom=
.  When you can't beat them you can at least act as if you're going to join=
 them.  And all is well if you can pull off the deception carefully.  Tucso=
n realizes he can not defeat Magmatron in a one on one but, he can find a w=
ay around him.  He will definitely gather troops on all sides for the fight=
 against Magmatron, including the Preds and Decepticons who are also annoye=
d with Magmatron.  I will send Airly a message about that and see what she =
thinks, but only after I hear from you.  That's it for now.  Happy writing.=
  ^^
